user.title: Configure Claude via Vertex AI
user.description: Enter your Google Cloud project details and credentials to use Anthropic Claude via Vertex AI.

data_description.project_id: Your Google Cloud Platform project ID with Vertex AI and Claude API access
data_description.location: The region where Claude on Vertex AI is available (e.g., us-east5)
data_description.service_account_json: Paste the entire contents of your service account JSON key file OR authorized_user OAuth credentials

error.missing_fields: Credentials JSON is missing required fields. For service_account: type, project_id, private_key, client_email. For authorized_user: type, client_id, client_secret, refresh_token
error.connection_failed: Unable to connect to Claude via Vertex AI - check your credentials, project ID, and region. Ensure Claude API is enabled in your GCP project.
error.invalid_service_account: Invalid credentials JSON - missing required fields
error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Vertex AI - check your project ID and region
